snippet: The police in Gilbert, Ariz., confirmed that J. T. Ready, an aspiring politician who led a vigilante border militia group, died in what apparently was a murder-suicide.
abstract: Gilbert, Ariz, police say that Jason Todd Ready, former Marine and leader of a vigilante border militia, is one of the five people who were shot to death in an apparent murder-suicide; initial investigation points to Ready as the shooter.
lead_paragraph: The police in Gilbert, Ariz., confirmed that J. T. Ready, an aspiring politician who led a vigilante border militia group, died in what apparently was a murder-suicide.

headline.seo: Vigilante Leader Among Five Shot Dead in Arizona
headline.main: Vigilante Leader Was Among Five Shot Dead in Arizona
headline.print_headline: Vigilante Leader Was Among Five Shot Dead in Arizona
